overview:
Passionate about entrepreneurship and information technology.

Partner at Akka Venture.

Akka Venture is a Paris and Stockholm based corporate finance firm focused on providing high level strategic and financial advisory to European growth companies and their investors.

Reference transactions include deals such as Canalce (FR), Travelhorizon (FR), Videoplaza (SWE), Telogic (DK), representing more than 35mâ‚¬ transaction volume.

Previously a VC at SociÃ©tÃ© Generale, David was involved in about 30 early and later stage VC and M&A transactions in the fields of telecommunication, semi-conductor, software, e-commerce, media and Internet. He started his career in financial controlling at Vivendi, responsible for the reporting and consolidation over 1bâ‚¬ activity from worldwide subsidiaries.
